entry.title: PURiGUARD Balaclava
entry.summary:
Vendor: NonZero Gravity
Type: Headgear
Price: 22.00

● Designed, based & serviced in California
● Antibacterial PURiGUARD® Technology
● Anti-chafe Liner
● 4-Way Stretch
● UPF 50+

Get antibacterial protection while wrapped in a classic Balaclava next time you’re out on a motorcycle, hunting or skiing. PURiGUARD® technology protects and keeps you fresh using odorless and non-toxic Zinc Oxide for an antibacterial finish. Designed to be worn alone or layered under a helmet while absorbing sweat and keeping your eyesight free of excess moisture. A necessary sports gear addition to your next hunting trip or to be worn with ski goggles; the 4-way stretch allows you to mold the shape to fit your needs. Plus, get 50+ UPF sun protection and ride into the sunset free of sun and wind burn.

Materials: 92% Polyester, 8% Spandex

Care: Machine wash cold. Lay flat to dry. Do not iron.

Warranty: 1 Year Manufacturer Guarantee

Based in California. Made in Taiwan.

entry.title: PURiGUARD Neck Gaiter
entry.summary:
Vendor: NonZero Gravity
Type: Headgear
Price: 14.00

  • PURiGUARD Technology
  • Antibacterial Finish
  • Multi-Use Design
  • 4-Way Stretch
  • UPF 50+

 

The PURiGUARD Neck Gaiter is a multifunctional form-fitting cover with antibacterial protection. PURiGUARD technology uses odorless and non-toxic Zinc Oxide to provide an antibacterial fabric finish while reducing 60% of chemical and 41% of carbon emission during the manufacturing process. Lightweight, breathable material stretches in all four directions for a snug fit that can easily slide on and off. The flat-lock stitching lays smooth against your skin to prevent chafing. Follow the action indoor or outdoors with UPF 50+ sun protection.

Material: 92% Polyester, 8% Spandex

Care: Machine wash cold. Air dry. Do not iron.
